name: LD51 - I'm Just Hungry
description:
Play as a slime that is just hungry and needs to eat. How much food can you eat before you die to the increasing number of adventurers trying to kill you ?

  • WASD to move
  • Left Mouse to shoot

Each food restore some hunger, and also provide some benefits.

  • Cherry - Shoot 3 bullets instead of 1.
  • Carrot - Bullet pierce enemies.
  • Cabbage - Deal some AOE damage, higher duration = bigger radius.
  • Potato - Split into smaller bullet on impact with enemy.
  • Apple - Increase damage, higher duration = higher damage increase.
  • Orange - Increase rate of fire, higher duration = higher rate of fire.
  • Banana - Increase movement speed, higher  duration = more increase.

Made for LD51 - Every 10 Seconds.

Tips: Because all the buffs stack with higher duration, you need to gather as much food as possible while keeping it stacked. If you lose the stack, you may not have enough damage kill enemy in the later part of the game.
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/im-just-hungry
